Summary: chrome sphere approx. 2 ft . diameter cruising 20-25 mph, inches above chaparral brush, horizontal to bottom slope of mountain, air was still, 4 witnesses
divs: sighting detailswhen this sighting occurred i was a firefighter in imperial county in southern california. i am currently a school teacher in san diego county. i have never reported this until now, though it occurred prior to the usa's bicentennial. there were 4 of us driving from hwy 86 near the salton sea, going to the mountain community, julian, ca up hwy 78. it was a clear spring afternoon with no detectable air movement. we had passed rt.3 and then rt.2 and were climbing the narrow winding rd. approaching the julian area when one of the rear passengers got excited and had me pull to the side just as i approached an observation pullout. he pointed across to the other side of the sloped arroyo, covered with thick green 4-5 ft. high chapparal brush about 100 ft above the base of the mountain. it had no road nor pathway on that side and was less than 200 feet across from us. what we saw was a small chrome-like sphere, perfectly round with no observable markings approaching us . at first, due to the distance and speed, i thought it was a motorcyle rider's helmet reflecting the sun, but as it got closer there was nothing beneath it and was too big, perhaps 2 feet in diameter. it moved at a perfect steady speed and height just inches above the brush. it was too steady and fast to be a balloon and there wasn't even a slight breeze. nothing was attached to it. we watched it pass and go in the direction we came, but on the other side of the pass. we watched it rise and fall with the terrain in a perfect horizontal path until it rounded the mountain about a mile behide us and dissappeared as it rounded the bend. it never waivered, other than to clear and follow the mountainside, in a straight path to some unknown destination. when it was over we all confirmed that what we saw and did was the same thing. we all described it exactly the same except for it's perceived size, which varied from 1 1\2 ft to 3 ft across. none of us could explain how it could have possibly manuvered the way it did. none of us had ever seen anything like it before. we all agreed that it was a ufo, but not anything like what we expected one to look like. since then i have heard of similar sightings and decided to add my confirmation that these things do (or did) exist. four of us witnessed one.
